umount: /media/cdrom0: device is busy: How do I find out what's using my CD drive
It says the device is busy
sudo fuser -m /media/cdrom0    - that will give you the process id(s) of whatever is using your cdrom

hopefully just plug it in and use Sane
try a quick google for the make, model and "linux"
swap doesn't show up in df -h because it's not mounted as such
free will tell you how much swap you have currently
yes, swap isn't mounted like a filesystem
